Package au.csiro.pathling.library.io.source

Class FileSource

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.library.io.source.AbstractSource
au.csiro.pathling.library.io.source.DatasetSource
au.csiro.pathling.library.io.source.FileSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataSource, QueryableDataSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
BundlesSource, DeltaSource, NdjsonSource, ParquetSource
public abstract class FileSource extends DatasetSource
Common functionality for file-based sources.
Author:
John Grimes

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected final String
    extension
    The file extension that this source expects for its source files.
    protected final Function<String,Set<String>>
    fileNameMapper
    A function that maps a resource type code to a set of file names that contain data for that resource type.
    protected final DataFrameReader
    reader
    A DataFrameReader that can be used to read the source files.
    protected final BiFunction<Dataset<Row>,String,Dataset<Row>>
    transformer
    A function that transforms a Dataset<Row> containing raw source data of a specified resource type into a Dataset<Row> containing the imported data.

  • Field Details

    • fileNameMapper

      protected final Function<String,Set<String>> fileNameMapper
      A function that maps a resource type code to a set of file names that contain data for that resource type.

    • extension

      @Nonnull protected final String extension
      The file extension that this source expects for its source files.

    • reader

      @Nonnull protected final DataFrameReader reader
      A DataFrameReader that can be used to read the source files.

    • transformer

      @Nonnull protected final BiFunction<Dataset<Row>,String,Dataset<Row>> transformer
      A function that transforms a Dataset<Row> containing raw source data of a specified resource type into a Dataset<Row> containing the imported data.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileSource

      protected FileSource(@Nonnull PathlingContext context, @Nonnull String path, @Nonnull Function<String,Set<String>> fileNameMapper, @Nonnull String extension, @Nonnull DataFrameReader reader, @Nonnull BiFunction<Dataset<Row>,String,Dataset<Row>> transformer)
      Parameters:
      context - the Pathling context
      path - the path to the source files, which may be a directory or a glob pattern
      fileNameMapper - a function that maps a file name to a set of resource types
      extension - the file extension that this source expects for its source files
      reader - a DataFrameReader that can be used to read the source files
      transformer - a function that transforms a Dataset<Row> containing raw source data of a specified resource type into a Dataset<Row> containing the imported data
